name: lambda-optimize-image
description: Lambda function to optimize images uploaded to S3
author: Robin MÃ©tral <robin@metral.ch>

scripts.clean: aws lambda delete-function --function-name optimizeImage && rm -rf optimizeImage.zip
scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name optimizeImage --zip-file fileb://optimizeImage.zip --handler index.handler --runtime nodejs12.x --timeout 10 --memory-size 1024 --role $AWS_ROLE
scripts.deploy: npm run zip && npm run create
